column4: Can anyone tell me another way of installing Flash player plug in for firefox? From Flash website it doesnt work, from Add/Remove it doesn't work.
start by removing it and then reinstall it.. "sudo apt-get remove --purge flash-plugin-nonfree".
start by removing it and then reinstall it.. "sudo apt-get remove --purge flashplugin-nonfree"... then "sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree"
they've been updating that flash plugin so many times now.. I think they didn't cross all the t's or perhaps missed a dot over an i =)
